page.title: 17PLAYGROUND GAMES-TEANASSIE
page.content: One of the games we play in the school playground is Underarm Tig.In Underarm Tig, if you get caught you must hold out your arm till you get freed.Other games we play are chasing, "Kick the Can" and" Hide and Seek".On our pitch we play rugby,football,"Dodge The Ball"and we practice shinty skills.We make obstacle courses.We get wood,tyres and any other things we can find.We lay out the things and run round,through and over them.To play"Kick The Can"you use a carton and the person who is "it" counts to 500 and comes to look for you but he must watch the carton.He needs to watch the carton because someone who is not"it"could kick the carton and all the people who are caught would be free.Then the person would have to count again.
